model_response.text: Based on the text, the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza are a combination of precise meanings and definite conclusions. This is not because the ingredients themselves are flawed or unhelpful, but rather because the concept of what constitutes a perfect pizza, as well as the way it is presented, is imprecise.
